item.title: Setting up a VPN on a Unifi USG
item.description: Needed to set up a VPN on my Unifi Enable the radius service Settings -> Radius -> Server Set a good secret Create a network Set the type to Remote User VPN Specify a network for it Create a User You can specify a VLAN for them here Set tunnel type to L2TP Set tunnel medium type to IPv4
